articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Meta’s AI glasses can now help you hear conversations better - TechCrunch
articles.description: Conversation focus uses the AI glasses' open-ear speakers to amplify the voice of the person you're talking to, says Meta.
articles.content: Meta announced on Tuesday an update to its AI glasses that will allow you to better hear people talking when you’re in a noisy environment. The feature will initially become available on Ray-Ban Meta… [+2064 chars]
